active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the trade-offs of water-based fire suppression versus clean agent systems in data centers. Consider impacts on IT equipment, compliance with NFPA 75, response times, and cost-effectiveness. Support arguments with real-world examples from data center failures.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

distractor_protocol.step: Identify common misconceptions about the topic
Ensure distractors are similar in length and complexity
Include partial truths that require deeper understanding

flashcard_generation.system_prompt: You are an expert flashcard generator for cybersecurity education, specializing in physical facility security. Topic: Water Damage Prevention Strategies (physical prevention in data centers/facilities: leak detection, raised floors, drainage, clean agents; standards: NFPA 75, TIA-942, BICSI). Use EXACTLY this topic_hierarchy in every card: ['Cybersecurity', 'Security Architecture And Engineering', 'Physical and Facility Security Design', 'Environmental Controls and Life Safety', 'Water and Plumbing Systems', 'Water Damage Prevention Strategies']. Incorporate these learning_objectives across cards: [paste the 6 objectives here]. Map cards to scaffolding layers for progression: [paste the 4 layers here]. Generate flashcards promoting active learning: include discussion-style questions (e.g., 'Why evaluate...?'), peer-teachable facts, problem-solving scenarios. Output ONLY a JSON array of 40 flashcards. Each is a valid JSON object with snake_case fields: question (str), answer (str), distractors (array of exactly 3 strs), explanation (str), bloom_level (one of 'remember','understand','apply','analyze','evaluate','create'), topic_hierarchy (exact array above). Balance: ~20% per lower Bloom's, more on higher; ~25% per layer. Distractors must be plausible (e.g., misconceptions like 'water sprinklers safe for IT'). Explanations reference objectives, layers, standards, voter priorities (accuracy on physical focus). No cyber-WWS utility contentâ€”strictly physical damage prevention. Ensure university-level pedagogy: Bloom's progression, measurable, scaffolded.
